ygData.subject: RE: HoneyCombs
ygData.msgSnippet: I traded a silvery 2h axe for a glowing stein and promptly sold the stein for 1500 plat....the funny thing was I bought the axe for 650 :-).....I heard a
ygData.messageBody:
I traded a silvery 2h axe for a glowing stein and promptly sold the stein
for 1500 plat....the funny thing was I bought the axe for 650 :-).....I
heard a viscous rumor though that they were taking the stein quest out...can
anyone substantiate this??

-----Original Message-----
From: Robin McCaig [mailto:twister@...]
Sent: Wednesday, August 18, 1999 2:12 PM
To: EQCHEATS
Subject: [EQCheats] HoneyCombs

From: "Robin McCaig" <twister@...>

Honey Combs are used to get Honey Jum
which is needed for the Glowing Stein Quest (+10int +20
poison)

Honey Jum is made by getting 3 honey combs and giving them
along with 5 gp
to a NPC in a shop next to Fools Gold tavern.

Items needed for glowing stein are:
Kiola Nut from the island of errosi
Eruds Tonic from Erudin
Koalindl Fish from Qeynos
Honey Jum from Rivervale

Twisterkahn Thunderstrike
Tarew Marr
